data.title: Beasley Broadcast Group to Report 2011 First Quarter Results and Host Webcast on May 3
data.meta_description: NAPLES, Fla., April 26, 2011 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (Nasdaq:BBGI), a large- and mid-size market radio broadcaster, will release its fiscal 2011 first quarter financial results before the market opens on Tuesday, May 3, 2011. The Company will also host a webcast that morning at 11:00 a.m. ET.
data.text:
NAPLES, Fla., April 26, 2011 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (Nasdaq:BBGI), a large- and mid-size market radio broadcaster, will release its fiscal 2011 first quarter financial results before the market opens on Tuesday, May 3, 2011. The Company will also host a webcast that morning at 11:00 a.m. ET.

Interested parties may access the webcast at the Company's web site at . Please allow 15 minutes to register and download and install any necessary software. Questions from analysts and institutional investors may be e-mailed to ir@bbgi.com at any time up until 10:00 a.m. ET on Tuesday, May 3, 2011. Management will answer as many questions as possible during the webcast (provided the questions are not addressed in their prepared remarks). Following its completion, a replay of the webcast can be accessed for five days on the Company's web site, .

Founded in 1961, Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. is a radio broadcasting company that owns and operates 42 stations (26 FM and 16 AM) located in eleven large- and mid-size markets in the United States. The Company also provides management services to two FM stations in Las Vegas for which it has an option to purchase, and operates one station in the expanded AM band in Augusta, GA.

The Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. logo is available at http://www.globenewswire.com/newsroom/prs/?pkgid=4259

For further information, or to receive future Beasley Broadcast Group news announcements via e-mail, please contact Denyse Mesnik, Beasley Broadcast Group, at 239/263-5000 or email@bbgi.com, or Joseph Jaffoni, Jaffoni & Collins, at 212/835-8500 or bbgi@jcir.com.

CONTACT: B. Caroline Beasley, Chief Financial Officer Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. 239/263-5000 or email@bbgi.com Joseph Jaffoni Jaffoni & Collins Incorporated 212/835-8500 or bbgi@jcir.com
